abstract: Class AAA and Class AA, but not Major Leagues, will begin using pitch clock; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: A pitch clock will be used this season in minor league games at Class AAA and Class AA, but it has been ruled out for the major leagues this year.
snippet: A pitch clock will be used this season in minor league games at Class AAA and Class AA, but it has been ruled out for the major leagues this year.

headline.main: Pitch Clock Will Be Used in Minors
